title: Mococo just wants to talk

summary: Nerissa thought that the biggest obstacle to being with Elizabeth would be Lady Bloodflame herself. She forgot that her new little sister is a terrifying threat.

title: Knight/Night
author: SubspaceEntity
summary: Elizabeth wakes to a horrible racket from the Cerulean Cup's building ground.  Upon confronting the source of the sound, she finds common ground with the one she least expected.

title: Memories Returned
author: Crooked_Crow
characters: Gonathan G | Gigi Murin's Alter Ego
summary: You've recovered a portion of your memories. Gonathan G was an honorable knight.Gigi Murin was... not that. Gonathan doesn't know how to confront his memories.

title: Atonement
author: Satashi
summary: After Elizabeth chooses to side with Nerissa during Advent's betrayal, she finds herself living with the traitors at an old abandoned fort. Yet residents seem to come to them, and soon their little rebellion has its own small town spreading out from their new home.Now Elizabeth must deal with not only her choice, but with the puppet master Shiori, who caused all of her problems. Nerissa is trying to keep them from fighting, but the hatred she feels for the archiver is strong... So why is Shiori, who also hates her, acting so different now that they are together all the time? And what secret is being kept from Elizabeth that both Nerissa and Shiori know?"Something that will make me join your side without hesitation, that wouild make me leave all my friends to follow Shiori... what are you not telling me?"

title: Trust and Betrayal
author: Satashi
summary: Elizabeth and Nerissa share a moment in the hot springs together, then deepen their relationship and open their hearts.

title: A Path, Barred

title: The Lady Protector
author: SubspaceEntity

some stuff won't be answered but like Trust Me
summary: As Libestal fades around her, Elizabeth finds herself forced to choose for whom she will fight.As Raora brings disturbing news, Elizabeth finds herself forced to choose for whom she will fight.

title: Death Do Us Part
author: PencilOfDarkness
summary: Love might have been a nice idea, but Calli knew better. It was nothing but a fleeting fairy tale that her friends were all chasing towards an inevitable bitter end. Not even Gonathon’s marriage seemed built to last, so what hope was there for someone like her?There was nobody in the world who would marry a Grim Reaper, anyway. And there was definitely nobody in particular that the Grim Reaper had ever explicitly thought about marrying and/or running a restaurant with, despite the name the persistent, cheeky little skeleton voices in her head kept throwing out at her.-A tournament to win the hand of Libestal’s most eligible tavern keeper is brewing, with plots, conspiracies, and shenanigans aplenty. The problem is, no one actually bothered to consult Calli about it.Being an unwilling tournament prize is the least of her troubles, though. As she and Kiara navigate a strange dungeon in the wastelands, Calli is faced with memories of a past life she’d rather forget. Now, she must unravel the painful truth of why Reapers can’t fall in love in order to rewrite her destiny.A tale spanning two lifetimes: a romantic tragedy, and a comedy of errors in which true love eventually prevails.

title: Every Night a New Hope, Every Day a New Beginning
author: Siderial
summary: Post-ENReco Chapter 2. A conversation between Nerissa and Elizabeth about what they were, what they are, and what they could be.“‘Justice’ is such a cruel word.”
